body:
I've been watching a let's play of Pauseunpause play Everybody's gone to the Rapture and it's a beautiful exploration game. I was gonna pick it up but because I know what happens story wise it kinda ruins the game.

So I was just wondering if anyone has any suggestions of any good exploration based games?

Chur bros.
body_tagged:

title: Exploration games.

replies.body: Do you mean like adventure mode sort of games?
replies.body_tagged: Do you mean like adventure mode sort of games?

reply_to.body: Do you mean like adventure mode sort of games?
reply_to.body_tagged: Do you mean like adventure mode sort of games?

replies.body:
WOW, just googled that game and it looks amazing!
It almost looks like it's real.

If you want to explore a world or so, create a singleplayer world in minecraft xD
replies.body_tagged:
WOW, just googled that game and it looks amazing!

replies.body: I've played WoW for the past few months and I can assure you it's one of the best games out there.
replies.body_tagged: I've played WoW for the past few months and I can assure you it's one of the best games out there.

replies.body: Wow is cool but the monthly fee stops most people from playing it. Just curious what Realm do you play on?

It's freeeeeeeee

replies.body: I actually watched a Let's Play of the last episode due to IRL time restrictions. Honestly though, I would have chosen them driving away but I definitely enjoyed the other ending a whole lot better.

replies.body: No shame in that. I chose them driving away for selfish reasons mostly. No way would I want to lose someone that close to me.
